name: Bridge Maker (itch)
description:
Lets see if you can cross the platforms. Hit the bull’s eye to collect the diamonds.

Build bridges to go from platform to platform.

Simply tap and hold the screen to increase the length of the bridge and release to make it fall over.

Are you skilled enough to get a ‘Perfect’ and obtain the diamond?

Or will you embarrass yourself by missing the platform completely?

If you think you are a savage then go for the Epic or Legend rating by landing right on the starting end of the platform. High risk, Highest Reward!

How long will you survive?

No Ads or In-App Purchases. Just Enjoy!

Don't forget to share it with your friends and post on social media.

Download from Play Store for a download size of just 13MB!

If you like it, please support the developer by donating.
